data.title: Adventures in Writing Summer Camp
data.meta_description: Young writers, get ready to go on an exciting exploration with Adventures in Writing Summer Camp!
data.text:
From comics and poetry, to writing about monsters and heroes, this year has an epic writing journey in store.

EVERYONE’S A STORYTELLER with ROSIEE THOR

Learn how to combine the elements of story into a fully fledged elevator pitch. Create a first line that makes an impact! And enter the Dialogue Dimension to get your characters talking.

WORLD BUILDING FOR THE REAL WORLD: STRATEGIES FOR FICTIONALIZING THE WORLD WE LIVE IN with BILL CAMERON

World building isn’t only for science-fiction and fantasy. It’s just as important for fiction set in our everyday world, whether in the present or past.

PAPER JAM

In this hands-on session, you’ll discover the wonder of making your own paper from scratch. You’ll also make cards from handmade paper and learn the easy way to write a thank you note, mad libs style. Prepare to tear it up.

EMBODYING YOUR STORY with JEANY VAN MELTEBEKE SNIDER

Delve into improvisation to learn how to add physical expression to your written story, create active characters, and drop into your natural voice.

COMIC-IZE YOUR STORY with JEN HERNANDEZ

In this workshop, you’ll turn your story ideas into comics! We’ll practice how to pick ideas to comic-ize, share drawing tips and then we’ll create one-page comics or comic strips using artist drawing tools. Bring your story notes, OCs, and inspirational graphic novels to this end of the week comic extravaganza!

On the last day, we host a reading of student work and invite family and friends to come hear the tall tales and wild adventures campers have composed this week. This last day will run a little longer and the readings will be from 4-5 PM. More details will be provided closer to the start of the camp.
